name: The Penguin Choir
description:
The Penguin Choir is a game about singing penguins. The goal is to match penguins humming the same note. Think match-3 with sound instead of color! If that's not your style, you can always arrange the penguins to create a musical masterpiece.

Use the mouse to rearrange penguins, Z and X to change the tempo, and space to navigate menus.

Thanks for playing! Contact  me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
